entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this evening then partly cloudy. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming north 20 gusting to 40 then light this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
